meanings.definition: The generation of static electricity by friction.
meanings.sent1: When I rubbed the balloon on my hair, I felt the triboelectricity build up.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study triboelectricity to understand how static electricity is created.
meanings.sent3: The party trickster created triboelectricity by rubbing socks on the carpet and shocking everyone!
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was like triboelectricity, ready to spark at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The crackling sound of triboelectricity filled the air as the balloons rubbed against each other.

meanings.definition: The study of the generation of static electricity by friction.
meanings.sent1: Learning about triboelectricity helps us understand how static electricity is formed.
meanings.sent2: In school, we had a whole lesson dedicated to the science of triboelectricity.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for triboelectricity was truly electrifying!
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity about triboelectricity sparked a new interest in science for the students.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained triboelectricity in a way that made it easy to grasp the concept.
